title: 26 people die in fiery crash of freight truck and passenger van in northern Mexico
description: Mexician authorities say a fiery highway crash involving a passenger van and a freight truck killed 26 people dead in northern Mexico

title: Police fatally shoot knife-wielding man who allegedly threatened people at grad party
description: Police in Houston shot and killed a suspect at a party who allegedly threatened his neighbors with a knife Saturday night, authorities said.

title: Authorities assess damage after sidewalk sinkhole on New Mexico bridge; 2 pedestrians rescued
description: Authorities are assessing the damage after a sidewalk sinkhole developed on a bridge in New Mexico, resulting in the rescue of two pedestrians

title: Florida man sets record for living underwater
description: An underwater researcher in the Florida Keys is now the world record holder for living underwater at ambient pressure

title: Wagner mercenary boss suggests Russia may have downed its own military aircraft
description: Four Russian military aircraft reportedly crashed in a region bordering Ukraine.

title: WATCH:  Deputy narrowly avoids wrong-way driver
description: A sheriff in Nevada narrowly avoided a head-on collision with a truck going the wrong way.

title: Grizzlies suspend Ja Morant after another gun video appears on social media
description: There's another social media video in which he appears to be holding a gun.

title: Gatwick airport shuts runway after reports of nearby drone activity
description: London’s Gatwick Airport closed its runway for almost an hour.

title: These are the regions experiencing dangerous heat
description: Millions of people on the West Coast are facing a continuation of intense early-season heat for multiple days, forecasts show.

title: Bolivian EV startup hopes tiny car will make it big in lithium-rich country
description: The municipality of La Paz, Bolivia, is using a small fleet of tiny electric cars to bring doctors to patients' homes living in the suburbs of the capital city

title: Shooting in downtown Louisville, Kentucky, leaves 1 dead, 4 wounded
description: Authorities say a shooting broke out during a dispute inside a downtown Louisville, Kentucky, business, killing one

title: Child social media stars have few protections. Illinois aims to fix that
description: Illinois lawmakers aim to make their state what they say will be the first in the country to create protections for child social media influencers

title: AI presents political peril for 2024 with threat to mislead voters
description: Thanks to recent advances in artificial intelligence, tools that can create lifelike photos, video and audio are now cheap and readily available

title: Sweden celebrates Eurovision win; Ukrainian duo defiant after Russian strike on hometown
description: Liverpool is cleaning up after the Eurovision Song Contest, as Sweden celebrates victory

title: 7 injured in shooting at Arizona gathering, police say
description: Seven people were transported to a hospital after a shooting in Yuma, Arizona, late Saturday, police said.

title: Large fight breaks out, police respond to political party's Minneapolis city council campaign event
description: A brawl broke out at a political party’s campaign event for Minneapolis City Council candidates Saturday, resulting in a call to police and injuries following the fight sparked by loud disagreements over nominations

title: Cease-fire between Israel and militants in Gaza appears to hold after days of fighting
description: A fragile cease-fire between Israeli forces and militants in the Gaza Strip appears to be holding, after a five-day clash that killed 33 Palestinians and two people in Israel

title: Turkey's elections for presidency, parliament set to begin
description: Voters in Turkey go to the polls on Sunday for pivotal parliamentary and presidential elections that are expected to be tightly contested and could be the biggest challenge Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan faces in his two decades in power

title: Trump cancels Iowa rally as DeSantis says governing is 'not about entertaining'
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis pitched a "positive alternative" to GOP voters in Iowa on Saturday while Donald Trump was forced to cancel his rally there due to weather.

title: WATCH:  Sea lion trained by Navy to be 'avid gamer'
description: Scientists at a U.S. Naval base have trained several sea lions to play video games, including one named Spike that has quickly become an "avid gamer."
